title: Bubble and squeak with Christmas leftovers
ingredients: ['1 knob butter', '1 onion, finely chopped', 'leftover veg and turkey or roast trimmings', '4 rashers of cooked bacon or leftover pigs in blankets and stuffing', '1 egg for binding', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper', '1 tablespoon oil for frying', '2 eggs for frying']
